professional_summary: Oracle Database Administrator with extensive experience in Oracle database administration, including RMAN, ASM, OEM, SQL*Plus, PL/SQL, and other related tools. Expertise in database migration, backup and recovery, performance tuning, and capacity planning.

key_responsibilities: Configured standby database for DR setup using OEM.
Resolved various database issues involving export/import
Migrated 10g/11g databases to 12c using export/import and RMAN methods.
Implemented backup and recovery procedures including cold/hot backups and incremental backups.
Built numerous 12c databases in RAC and standalone environments.
Created database links and materialized views.
Monitored and analyzed AWR/ADDM reports for expensive SQLs and provided recommendations.
